callToAction.default: Support our work by becoming a member of the Ethub community. You will receive your own Non Fungible Token!
callToAction.expired: Unfortunately your previous key has expired... But you can get a new one now!
callToAction.pending: Your transaction has been sent but not mined yet... you'll get your Non Fungible Token right after.
callToAction.confirmed: Thanks a lot for your support. It means a lot to us. Please send us feedback, question and suggestions!
